column.name: CONFIG_SERVICE_CHAR_ID
column.comment: This column stores data which uniquely identifies a Configurable Service Characateristic

column.name: EFFECTIVE_DATE
column.comment: The Effective Date is the date for which a particular instance of a Configurable Service Characteristic is effective.

column.name: CHANGE_TYPE
column.comment: The type of change allowed for this type of payment. Valid for POS payments only

column.name: LOADTM
column.comment: data warehouse entry change date timestamp (Original name in the DWHDB "_LOADTM")

column.name: SERVICE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID
column.comment: This column is the is the unique identifier for the foreign key to the related Service Subscription.

column.name: SERVICE_TICKET_POSITION_ID
column.comment: This column stores the associated Service Ticket Position.

column.name: ADDRESS_ID
column.comment: This column identifies the associated ADDRESS. This is logical foreign key to the ADDRESS table.

column.name: ASSOCIATED_CONFIG_SERV_CHAR_ID
column.comment: This column stores data which Identifies any dependent Configurable Service Characteristics

column.name: EFFECTIVE_STATUS
column.comment: The Effective Status defines a row as being ACTIVE or DEACTive on the associated Effective Date.

column.name: DATA_TYPE_RD
column.comment: Restricts the range of possible types of values an object might have ( e.g. string, integer, Boolean etc.)

column.name: MANDATORY_FOR_PROVISIONING
column.comment: This colum`s data determines whether a value must be entered for the  characteristic prior to sending the SERVICE TICKET POSITION to  Provisioning. When a attribute has a default value, no value needs  to be specified and the default value will be used

column.name: SET_BY_CUSTOMER_REP_IND
column.comment: This column`s data determines whether a Customer Representative can  modify the CONFIGURABLE SERVICE CHARACTERISTIC.

column.name: SERVICE_CHARACTERISTIC_CODE
column.comment: This column stores key to associated PSM service characteristic

column.name: COMPLETION_DATE
column.comment: This attribute represents the day that the Service Ticket Position was  completed by the Provisioning component. This date will be used to  create fixed charges when sent to pricing.

column.name: PRICEABLE_CHARACTERISTIC_ID
column.comment: This field is populated if the Characteristic has been defined as  priceable by PSM.

column.name: AUDIT_UPDATE_USER_ID
column.comment: Audit information capturing user id of last update

column.name: AUDIT_UPDATE_DATE_TIME
column.comment: Audit information capturing date and time of last update

column.name: UPDATE_NUMBER
column.comment: Version number of the row. The version number starts with a random number and is  incremented on each update.  Update and Delete operations verify that the number in the database is equal to the  number used in the SQL statement (optimistic locking).

column.name: EFFECTIVE_FLAG
column.comment: Flagging of entries according to EFFECTIVE_DATE maintained by source system (EFFONL). "N" (now) - currently valid entry, "P" (past) - entry that was valid some then in the past, "F" (future) - entity will be valid in the future.
